summary: The Occultus race is a halfbreed between the Nord and the Dark Elf race. The Occultus are masters of hiding and fierce assassins. The Occultus race runs faster than other races, and have a fast health and stamina regen.
descriptionHtml:
~~-------------------Dlc\'s Required-------------------~~ 

This mod requires the following dlc\'s: Only the Skyrim game itself. 

~~-------------------External Site-------------------~~ 

Skyrim Nexus link: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34182 

~~-------------------Story-------------------~~ 

The Occultus race is a halfbreed between the Nord and the Dark Elf race. A few Dark Elves move every now and then from Morrowind to Skyrim for a better life. The Dark Elf females marries Nord males, so that their children will become healthy, and have wealth. The Nord males were not allowed to take a Dark Elf as a bride. The once who did were shunned upon and expelled from their residence. Their families then moved in to the forest, and raised their children there. They taught their children to hunt, and to sucessfully stalk their pray without getting noticed. The Occultus are masters of hiding and fierce assassins. 

The Occultus race runs faster than other races, and have a fast health and stamina regen. 

~~-------------------The Name-------------------~~ 

For those who are wondering about what the name Occultus means. The name Occultus is latin for hidden, secret and mysterious. And that is just what the Occultus race is all about. 

~~-------------------Newly Added-------------------~~ 

Please welcome the female follower Aralyne Drovahyn of the Drovahyn family. There is a quest added as well, a courier will diliver a note to you. What ever town your in, he will come to you. But not helgen or Riverwood. Have fun guys, and please report any bugs. Also added a new follower to the mod, his name is Braden Sorril. He got stranded on shore not far from Windhelm, when he arrived by boat to Skyrim. He has heard about your heroic deeds by passing travellers, and does now want to join your adventures. Would you consider him your companion? Thank you for your support! 

~~-------------------Stats-------------------~~ 

Destruction: 5 

Alteration: 5 

Illusion: 5 

Sneak: 15 

Light Armor: 15 

Alchemy: 5 

Archery: 15 

~~-------------------Powers-------------------~~ 

Sense Life: The skill to sense life, nearby living creatures, but not undead, machines or daedra, can be seen through walls. 

Vanish: The power to turn invisible for a short time to escape a difficult situation. 

Paralyze: Paralyze your pray before you kill it. 

~~-------------------Abilities-------------------~~ 

The Occultus can regenerate HP in combat. 

~~-------------------And Finally-------------------~~ 

Please report any bugs or errors, that would be much appreciated. :)
author: Sophic

files.name: OccultusRace
files.changelogHtml:
Added a female follower (Aralyne Drovahyn) with a small quest and a house.
Reduced the health and stamina to a more "believable" level.
